messages.subject: Chats
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings, I am a homeschooling/unschooling mother of one and also co-adminstrate an irc network and  I d like to invite everyone to KnightNet. You can check
messages.messageBody:
Greetings,

I am a homeschooling/unschooling mother of one and also co-adminstrate an
irc network and I'd like to invite everyone to KnightNet. You can check out
our webpage at http://www.knightnet.net to learn more about KnightNet.
KnightNet is a small internet relay chat network that has a medieval flare.
We usually have a scheduled chat on Fridays, but others are also online
often while doing other projects. If there is no one in #homeschool you can
join #knights and usually find me there.


Homeschool Chat from 8-10 a.m. cst Fridays


Javascript version is http://chat.knightnet.net


Or

The mIRC server the Homeschool Chat is on is: shadow.knightnet.net
The Description is : shadow
The Channel we are on (or Tavern, as the Knightnet server calls them) is:
#Homeschool


If you have any questions feel free to contact me Sweety9@...

Hope to see some of you there :)

Kendra
also known as Sweets
